channel.title: Keras on Ephemeral Dance Of Electrons
channel.description: Recent content in Keras on Ephemeral Dance Of Electrons

item.title: Predicting the playing role of a cricketer using Machine Learning (Part 2)
item.description: In the previous post we saw how to scrape raw data from a content rich webpage. In this post, we will explore how to process that raw data and use Machine Learning tools to predict the playing role of a cricket player just based on his career statistics.
